RepositoryContents.Name: SoundManager
RepositoryContents.Description: The only sound changer you'll ever need!
RepositoryContents.Caption:
SoundManager allows you to change your system sounds with ease. With over 90 included sound options!!

Even including the option to select your own custom sounds!

Releases.Description: Adds MagSafe charging sound & Off option for Phone Dialer keys
Adds PixelShutter cam sound & a lot of new options
Adds PP7 Lock sound & changes Phone Dialer keys label
Adds option to choose custom sounds
Adds option to set custom sounds for: -Phone Dialer keys -Received Message -Sent Message
Sound options update, 64 new included sound options, updated UI
now plays a preview sound when selecting any audio option & some small UI changes

RepositoryContents.Name: NoVulnTools2
RepositoryContents.Description: The best toolbox for your device
RepositoryContents.Caption:
NoVulnTools is an all in one toolbox for your devices
It has:

‚Ä¢ UI Animation Speed
‚Ä¢ Custom side button speed
‚Ä¢ Playing sound upon pasting things
‚Ä¢ Your build version in the CC or status bar
‚Ä¢ Haptic upon wake for iPhone
‚Ä¢ Better battery information

And much more.

Once you have configured your options head to Settings ‚ûú General.

Releases.Description: File size fix - removed the home button speed
Custom settings icons support & Added toggle to enable or disable animation speed changes
slight re-design, changed default icons to the default ios icons, new low power icon that changes dynamically depending on iOS version, fixed VPN tab not working
Paste sound no longer requires a reboot, re-designed layout, lowers file size to support more iOS versions

RepositoryContents.Name: CarPlayWP
RepositoryContents.Caption:
CarPlayWP gives you the ability to change your CarPlay Wallpaper to whatever you like.

With just a few clicks in the tweak settings you can enjoy your very own wallpaper!!

RepositoryContents.Name: FelicitySettings
RepositoryContents.Description: a more colorful & detailed look for your settings
RepositoryContents.Caption: FelicitySettings takes everything that is great with the default iOS icon design and pushes it further.

Releases.Description: Adds option that allows users to set a custom image on top off settings
Adds option to set a gap between the custom image and icloud
slightly decreases file size to make the tweak better compatible with iOS 15.0
Decreases file size and adds icon for Home (fixes iOS 15.1 issues)

RepositoryContents.Name: Vivacity Settings
RepositoryContents.Description: A Vibrant Theme to Light up Your Settings!
RepositoryContents.Caption: Vivacity Settings takes everything that is great about default iOS design and gives it a modern and vibrant spin.

Releases.Description: Adds option that allows users to set a custom image on top off settings
Adds option to set a gap between the custom image and icloud
slightly decreases file size to make the tweak better compatible with iOS 15.0

RepositoryContents.Name: Double Bubble Settings

A modern and fresh rework of bubblegum settings. Features pastel colors that work well with any setup; light or dark!

(currently VPN, FaceID & Wallet icons don't theme properly, if a fix is found we will push out an update.)

Releases.Description: Adds option that allows users to set a custom image on top off settings

slightly decreases file size to make the tweak better compatible with iOS 15.0

Relive the old days with Classic Settings

This theme changes your settings icons into the iOS 6 icons.

Releases.Description: -redid shortcuts & measure icons -fixed developer settings icon
Decreases file size and adds icon for Home (fixes iOS 15.1 issues)

RepositoryContents.Name: AppCC
RepositoryContents.Description: Launching apps from the Control Center with ease
RepositoryContents.Caption: AppCC Allows you to launch any application from the Control Center, It includes some preset applications or you can use a custom Bundle ID to an application currently installed on your device.

Releases.Description: Added better support for other Control Center tweaks

RepositoryContents.Name: LSFootnote
RepositoryContents.Caption: This tweak allows you to simply add a footnote saying anything you like right above the home bar on the lockscreen.

RepositoryContents.Name: ColorBoard
RepositoryContents.Caption: The all-in-one tweak to bring color to your device, Changing 3D touch/menu colors, Dock colors, Notification colors, Folder colors & Control Center modules, background colors & App Library Colors & so much more.

Releases.Description:
Bug Fixes 
 ‚Ä¢ Notification Stacking 
 ‚Ä¢ Notification Shadow 
 ‚Ä¢ Notification Dark Secondary Text Color 
 Added Features 
 ‚Ä¢ Switcher Blur 
 ‚Ä¢ Spotlight Color 
 ‚Ä¢ Transparent App Library Pods

Added Features 
 ‚Ä¢ Notification Badge Color 
 Tweak Improvements 
 ‚Ä¢ Option to disable the effects.
Fixed Badge Color, & added support for kfd.
Added opacity values to Dock, Control Center & Folder colors & a option to make the control center modules & toggles clear.

RepositoryContents.Name: MuteAnimation

Releases.Description: Added an option to adjust the position of the animation or custom image.
